config.getRisExamSql: select P.PatientIntraID,PS.ProcedureStepContrastAgent as ProcedureStepCode,PS.ProcedureStepDescriptions, P.PatientNameEnglish,P.PatientNameChinese,P.PatientGender,P.PatientBirtday, E.ExamAccessionID,E.PreExamExamDate,E.PreExamScheduleDate, MT.ModalityTypeName from ExamInfo E inner join ProcedureStepInfo PS on E.ProcedureStepID=PS.ProcedureStepID inner join OrderInfo O on E.OrderID=O.OrderID inner join PatientInfo P on O.PatientIntraID=P.PatientIntraID inner join ModalityInfo M on E.ModalityID=M.ModalityID inner join ModalityTypeInfo MT on M.ModalityTypeID=MT.ModalityTypeID where ExamAccessionID=
